title: Blended Online Education Program for Strengthening Practical Competencies in Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: A customized online education program for current professionals, focusing on developing social sector competencies applicable in real-world settings

learning_goals: Learners complete at least 80% of the curriculum by utilizing motivation and self-directed learning strategies in online learning environments.
Learners perform practical problem-solving projects at least twice through interaction with peers and instructors in blended learning environments.
Learners effectively complete the curriculum by utilizing digital literacy in mobile device-centered learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
